translation.name: Yago
translation.mainD: A combination of backend and frontend development, simply passionate about technology.
translation.aboutSb: My name is Yago, I am a Developer, and I have been working in the field as a developer for about one year. I have solid experience in both front-end and back-end.
translation.aboutSb2: My passion for technology started in 2021 when I began creating websites on platforms like Shopify and Cartpanda for my own e-commerce. In 2022, I immersed myself in the field of programming, directing my energy towards learning and applying my knowledge.
translation.aboutSb3: As a hobby, I have a keen interest in learning languages and enjoying good music. These activities provide a perfect balance to complement my passion for the world of technology.
translation.projectsD: Some personal projects I have created simply to practice the technologies I use in my daily life.
translation.footer: Today, you have the opportunity to build the tomorrow you desire
